description: TAt the conference I would like to talk about:On-box and off-Box automation, Networking and system automation with Python for DevOps,Using REST-API with controllers,Creating automation tools as web applications with Django. Packages I want to talk about:netmiko, paramiko, pyvmomi. The conference audience will gain knowledge in managing the IT environment through automation to develop DevOps tools with Python.
title: DevOps with Python
